WorkItem.Description: When no gemming templates are selected, no items (besides equipped ones) show up in the Gear panes, regardless of whether they have gem slots.  Not a real problem, but may be confusing.
WorkItem.Summary: [5.0.0][Base] No items show up under Gear when no gemming templates are selected

Comments.Message: I actually loaded from battle.net from scratch again, and I do have the gear showing.  I have no idea what the XML above has wrong, but I can't reproduce it from scratch.

I found the problem.  This was caused by disabling all gemming templates, which somehow prevents any gear from showing up. I assumed having the gems manually marked with a green diamond would be sufficient for gemming to happen correctly during optimizations (and it does?), but this approach breaks the 'regular' gear pane.
